name: waxed canvas day bag/ small messenger bag/ kangaroo bag with waxed leather shoulderstrap
description:
This day bag for everyday use, I made from American waxed canvas, the large one is made in MOD olive and the smaller one in field tan..
I made it for the days you do not have to take a lot with you. Space enough for i-phone,purse, I-pod, and some other necessities.
If you like you can detach them and wear only one.

The bags close with a zipper closure, and are fully lined with bleu cotton.


The size of the large satchel measures 18 cm tall and 25 cm wide the smaller one is 14 cm tall and 22.5 cm wide..

which is in inches, 7.09 inch tall and 9.8 inch wide for the larger one and 5.5 inch tall and 8.8 inch wide for the smaller one.

name: Waxed canvas backpack with roll up top and waxed leather shoulderstrap,handle and leather bottem
description:
The material I used to make this bag is an American waxed canvas, the most beautiful waxed canvas you can imagine. The color is olive green
I made it into an everyday backpack/rucksack, with waxed leather straps and a waxed leather double closure with buckle. Roll to close top, and double outside pocket with protective flap.
This rucksack is fully lined with a blue cotton fabric, and has a large inside pocket.

All the bags are made and designed by myself and handmade with care and attention for details.

Do you like this design, but not the right size bag for you, convo me and I make a custom bag for you.


The rucksack measures approximately wide 40cm and rolled 45cm tall,unrolled 65cm and
12 cm deep.
In inches this is 16 inches wide, rolled 18inch tall and unrolled 26 inches tall and 
5.5 inches deep

name: Leather tote bag / shoulderbag made from oiled leather and waxed handles and waxed canvas bottom
description:
This bag is made from a soft cognac brown oiled leather with handles and closure (snap closure) in dark brown waxed leather. And a bottom in MOD olive waxed canvas.

The oiled leather sometimes shows some marks inside the leather from the time the animal was alive because this leather comes from cows that have lived and grassed outside hole there live. For me this only adds to the charm of the bag.

This bag is not lined.

The measurments are approximatly 34 cm tall, 48 cm wide and 10cm deep at the bottom
in inches this is 13.3 inches tall,18 inches wide and 4 inches deep at the bottom

name: Waxed canvas bag with roll to close top unisex collection
description:
The material I used to make this bag is heavy duty waxed canvas, the color field tan for the body, and MOD (olive) on the bottom. The roll to close/pull together part is in charcoal grey waxed canvas.
I made it into a durable every day carry all/tote bag, for all type of weather, due to the roll to close top, is this bag waterresistant.
I also put a double waxed canvas bottem on it, for durability, and strenght.
Fully lined with a bleu fabric with oiled leather handles. This tote has a double inside pocket.

This bag measures approximately 48cm wide,34cm tall 
10cm deep at the bottem
In inches this is 18 inches wide, 13.3 inches tall.
4 inches deep at the bottem

name: waxed canvas pouch / make up bag / satchel
description:
This pouch is made in waxed canvas (color olive green) with an oiled leather bottom.(color brown)
Ideal to keep all your small stuff, pencils, make up, Phone, money.......

The pouch closes with a zipper closure, and are fully lined with bleu cotton.


The size of the bag is 14 cm tall and 22.5 cm wide..

which is in inches 5.5 inch tall and 8.8 inch wide.

name: Waxed canvas messenger bag with roll to close top, and adjustable shoulderstrap UNISEX
description:
The material I used to make this bag is heavy duty waxed canvas, the color Charcoal grey
I made it into a durable messenger bag, for all type of weather, due to the roll to close top, this bag is waterresistant.
I also put a double waxed canvas bottem on it, for durability, and strenght; and added corner reinforcements in leather.
Fully lined with a bleu cotton and double inside pocket,and a double outside pocket. Closes with a buckle and strap!

This bag measures approximately 48cm wide,34cm tall(rolled) and 48cm unrolled.
10cm deep at the bottem
In inches this is 18 inches wide, 13.3 inches tall(rolled) and 18 inchs unrolled.
4 inches deep at the bottem

name: Waxed canvas tote bag with leather handles and double waxed canvas bottem COLLECTION UNISEX
description:
The material I used to make this bag is an American heavy weight waxed canvas, the most beautiful waxed cotton you can imagine. The color is navy blue and MOD (olive green)
I made it into an everyday bag, with vegetable tanned leather handles. The natural leather has been treated with a wax finish and will darken beautifully with age and use.
There is one outside pocket,with pouch button.

Fully lined with a blue cotton fabric and double inside pockets.

The hight of the mannequin is from neck till feed 148 cm or 4.8 feet or 58.2 inch, so you've got a better idea of the proportions of the bag!

All the bags are made and designed by myself and handmade with care and attention for detail.


The carry all measures approximately 48cm wide,34cm tall and
10cm deep at the bottem
In inches this is 19 inches wide, 13.3 inches tall and 
4 inches deep at the bottem

name: Waxed canvas pannier / bicycle bag with flap,COLLECTION UNISEX
description:
This bag has been made from waxed canvas and vegtable tanned leather, I love the combination of these materials.The natural leather has been treated with a wax finish and will darken beautifully with age.
 I made it big enough for a small laptop or I-pad, and all your other necessaties. 
This is perfect for your Spring and Summer pick nic.

The bag closes with a buckle and strap and is attached to the bike with a double buckle and strap.
There is a handle on top of the bag to carry the bag in hand.

The bag is made in fire-engine red waxed canvas, and has a closing flap in MOD olive green.

Fully lined with a blue cotton.

The size of this bag measures 30 cm tall and 38 cm wide, about 8cm deep

which is in inches, 11.8 inch tall and 14.9 inch wide and 3 deep

This bag is made with a lot of care and attention to detail in my home studio.

description:
The material I used to make this bag is an American waxed canvas. The color is olive green (gridwax) and navy blue for the flap, fire engine red for the shoulderpiece..(the red color is like in image 4, due to the natural light it gives a different shade of red in the first image)

I made it into an everyday backpack/rucksack, with waxed leather straps and a waxed leather closure with pouch snaps, and double outside pocket.

This rucksack is fully lined with a blue cotton fabric, there is one large inside pocket, the size of an Ipad, small laptop.

All the bags are made and designed by myself and handmade with care and attention for details.

I made it into a durable every day tote bag
Fully lined with a blue fabric with beautiful soft leather straps and double inside pocket..
